column4: I just upgraded to 3Mip internet service. My pages load really slowly with Ubuntu, but very quickly with XP. I "tuned" Firefox to work faster. What else can I do to load web pages faster?

Sorry for asking again: I just upgraded to 3Mip internet service. My pages load really slowly with Ubuntu, but very quickly with XP. I "tuned" Firefox to work faster. What else can I do to load web pages faster?
: are you using the same nameservers?
: and do the pages load faster with another browser like opera?
